root.name: Warlords: Battlecry III
root.description: OverviewWarlords Battlecry III is the third title of the Warlords Battlecry RTS series, a spin-off of the the popular turn-based 'Warlords' strategy game series. Set in the high fantasy world of Etheria, Warlords Battlecry III introduces new races, units, buildings and gameplay features, as well as graphical improvements. It continues and builds upon the hero-based RPG system that allows players to command their armies with powerful and persistent hero characters, with classes ranging from the lethal and insidious Assassin to the powerful Summoner able to call upon demonic aid.Battlecry III was re-released on GOG.com.RacesDwarfEmpireHigh ElfKnightBarbarianFeyMinotaurSsrathiWood ElfDaemonDark ElfDark DwarfOrcPlaguelordThe SwarmUndeadMinimum System RequirementsWindows XP / Vista1.8 GHz processor512MB RAM (1 GB recommended)3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended)2GB HDDMouseKeyboard
